info.name: Mangarock - Dark n Simple
info.description:
Turns the bright white colour pallet to a nice Dark. Making easier on the eyes.
Also hides ads.
info.additionalInfo: V1.2 (July 23rd, 2018) ► Fixed theme. V1.1 (June 25th, 2018): ► Fixed popup modals while reading. ► Removed most "Please disable adblocker" notices. └ If you want to get rid of all ads disable adblocker. It will also help support Mangarock. V1.0 (June 24th, 2018): ► First release.
